Field.Label: Always be careful when posting debug output to the forums or other public places. You should review it to ensure that it doesn't contain sensitive information.

Field.tooltip: Controls the amount of debug information written to the log.
Field.Label: Debug level:

Debugging Messages - Step by step plugin logging. Informational Messages - Useful information about plugin health. Warning Messages - Typically temporary conditions. Error Messages - Conditions you might want to address. Critical Errors Only - Critical errors should probably be reported.
